=========
Uniquepwd
=========

A package that provides a command: uniquepwd, that prints the shortest unique representation of the given path. Useful in prompts.

E.g.::

	cd C:\Users\jared\Documents\repos\uniquepwd
	uniquepwd (pwd)

prints::

	C:\U\j\Doc\r\u\

Installation:
=============

Install using pip::

  pip install uniquepwd
